ngiemboon: Mé ně ńdɔgɔ pɔ̌ɔn mmó, ńtsɛ́ɛ ncwò kɔ̀ʼ.
en: We closed the portico with the plate.
yours (second person singular possessive pronoun referring back to class 2 nouns)
your (second person singular possessive adjective modifying class 2 nouns)
your (second person singular emphatic possessive adjective modifying class 2 nouns)

ngiemboon: Menɔ̀ɔn pie n gyǎ pǐ, epú ée mǒ.
en: The animals I saw outside, there are yours among them.
sound of a casserole lid falling onto dust or sand

ngiemboon: Nzìŋe lekʉŋ gwě na pfepfɔ́b lê pùb.
en: The lid fell on the dust that “pùb”.
sound of the flame of a lamp that goes out

ngiemboon: Lâm ne ńgӱo lê pùbpùb, ńgee mbyě.
en: The lamp is going “pùbpùb” to turn off.
